Watering Can with Built-in Hose: A watering can with a built-in hose would allow for easy and precise watering of plants without having to manually pour water from the can. The hose would be retractable and easy to store when not in use.

Solar-Powered Watering Can: A solar-powered watering can would use solar energy to power a small pump that would allow for easy watering of plants without the need for electricity. The can would be designed to be charged by the sun and would be perfect for outdoor use.

Self-Watering Watering Can: A self-watering watering can would have a built-in mechanism that would allow for automatic watering of plants. The can would have a reservoir that would be filled with water and a pump that would dispense water to the plants at regular intervals.

Smart Watering Can: A smart watering can would be connected to a smartphone app that would allow for remote control of the watering process. The app would allow for scheduling of watering times and would provide information on the amount of water that has been dispensed and the amount that is left in the reservoir.

Watering Can with Built-in Fertilizer Dispenser: A watering can with a built-in fertilizer dispenser would allow for easy and precise application of fertilizer to plants. The dispenser would be designed to be easy to use and would be able to dispense the correct amount of fertilizer for the specific plant.
